Already Connected: You are already connected as a player!
Connected From Another Location: You have connected from a different location.
Steam Not Allowed: This server is only for no-steam players.
Unknown Client: You are using an unknown (non-whitelisted) client.
Blacklisted: You are blacklisted from this server.
Command: Syntax:
Syntax: nosteam.lists
(blacklist / whitelist) (add / remove) (id) - Add or remove user to a blacklist or a whitelist.
Command: Invalid ID: You have entered an invalid ID.
